text:
i chosed this degree so as to become a journalist, it is reliated to my passions photography and social network.Communication is very wide and learning all about these topics makes it very intersting. I learned about this topic very recently
it was quite intriging at first but after seing all of those different subjects that they teach i knew that this degree was made for me. I'm aware that being a journalist is difficult to attend but i'm hoping to become one. It is a very hard work mainly because of the sterotypes regarding this job. It is not in fact well-seen by the population in general but it doesn't affect me that much. I'm hoping becoming a journalist but being a reporter attracts me more but it doesn't matter if i become a journalist instead of a reporter. filming things and travelling are the main reasons of choosing this job it can be filming animal oriented repotage or more hardcore things like war for exemple. I'm very invested in learning different things and languages are fun to learn and it is very important nowadays. Especialy in
non-english speaking countries. Also we have to be somewhat social because being a journalist is all  about contact and interaction with others people. And so that why i chosed this degree and my motivation behind it.
